name: Folding Pruning Saw, Premium Folding Hand Saw with Secure Lock Comfort Soft Grip for Garden or Tree Pruning, Camping, Wood Working(Orange+Black)
short_description: ✔Branch saw tool cut faster which fits around the log perfectly. Folding Saw has a 7-inch premium 65Mn Carbon Steel Triple Cut blade for strength. The curve of the saw helps the branches saw cut more smoothly and efficiently by helping it stay on track.

✔Throw this lightweight saw in your backpack or toolbox. This rugged folding saw can be used as a pruner for garden pruning, camping equipment, survival gear, hiking wilderness accessory. This tool will be a great help in the bush for trail maintenance or while camping or constructing shelter.

✔The Orange handle makes it easy to find. When folded and not in use, the compact saw easily fits in your pocket. Then simply retrieve it from the pocket, flip the lock, extend the saw and lock it open.

✔The rugged handle feels grippy and made of non-slip materials. The size will work with any hand size from small to extra-large. The rugged razor tooth saw remains stable during strong pulls resulting in accurate cuts.
✔The branch saw is easy to open & close with a lock. The handle functions as a scabbard and sheath and the lock on the handle keeps it from flopping around when not in use. Great garden tool.

name: FLORA GUARD 12-Inch Folding Saw, Heavy Duty Hand Saw with Multi-Level Razer Teeth for Wood Cutting, Bushcraft and Gardening, Tree Trimming Camping Gardening Tools (Red-12")
short_description: More Powerful Performance: The 12-inch Folding saw is designed for larger, tougher cutting tasks. With its longer blade, it provides more cutting power, making it perfect for thicker wood, dense branches, or heavy-duty home repairs

Durable SK5 Steel Blade for Longer Use: Made of SK5 high-carbon steel and triple-sharpened to easily slice through wood, this camping saw stays sharp over time, even with frequent use, It’s built to last and handle tough materials without dulling quickly

Safety Lock for Added Protection: This pruning saw comes with an advanced safety lock feature, ensuring the blade stays firmly in place during use. When not in use, the blade can be safely locked to prevent accidental folding and potential injury during storage

Rubber Grip for Comfort & Control: The ergonomic handle of this wood saw features a non-slip grip for a comfortable and stable hold, ensuring control during long cutting sessions and reducing hand fatigue

Multi-Scene Versatility: This 12-inch hand saw is versatile enough for a wide range of tasks, from wood cutting to gardening, camping, and home repairs. Whether you're tackling large outdoor projects, heavy-duty cutting tasks, or smaller repairs, this saw is well-suited for various cutting jobs
After-Sales Support for Your Satisfaction: We offer comprehensive after-sales service to ensure your satisfaction. If you encounter any issues, our customer support team is available to assist you

name: Edward Tools 7” Folding Saw - Heavy Duty Harden Triple Razor Tooth Steel - Hand Saw for Camping, Pruning, Backpacking, Survival, Outdoors, Gardening, Trees - Foldable Safety Sheath
short_description: Heavy Duty - Made of #65 manganese steel this blade is harder and stronger than other folding saws
7” Triple Razor Tooth Blade makes for faster and cleaner cuts for cutting trees and branches
Multi Use Folding Saw - Great folding saw for camp, survival, backpacking, trees, gardening, landscaping with compact folding design
Safety lock blade - Once saw blade is folded closed it cannot be opening until pressing safety latch
Lifetime Warranty - All Edward Tools come with lifetime warranty
product_description: Edward Tools 7” Folding Saw is a heavy duty perfect size saw for camping, pruning, backpacking, outdoors and other activities. The triple razor tooth blade is made of #65 Manganese hardened steel that makes for faster and cleaner cuts. The safety lock blade locks the foldable blade into place and can be opened with pressing the safety button. Edward Tools 7” Folding Saw Comes with a lifetime warranty.

name: Kimura® 7" Pro Folding Pruning Saw - Heavy Duty Premium Japanese SK5 Steel Hand Saw, Ergonomic Soft Non-Slip Handle, Lightweight Foldable Ideal for Branches, Trimming, Camping, PVC, Hiking, Wood
short_description: [ SHARP & PRECISE ] - The 7-inch Japanese SK5 steel saw has a double layer edge, ensuring precision cutting and long-lasting sharpness. Ideal for both trimming and pruning wood up to 3 inches thick.
[ FOLDABLE ] – The folding saw is equipped with a rotating swivel at the handle allowing the saw to fold open into 3 unique positions allowing for comfortable sawing at all angles.

[ ERGONOMIC DESIGN ] - The non-slip handles feature a soft grip for enhanced comfort, control and safety. The even distribution of weight between the saw and handles makes it easy for anyone to use this pruning saw.
[ RUST RESISTANT ] - Chrome plating helps the saw glide through wood without sap build-up or rusting, allowing for a smooth cut every time.
[ HIGHLY VERSATILE ] - Kimura’s saw can be used in multiple situations including gardening and woodwork, or as part of a outdoors kit when camping or hiking.
[ EASY OPEN & CLOSE ] - Kimura’s folding pruning saw is equipped with a safety lock that is quick and easy to operate requiring only a light squeeze to unlock, and simple thumb push to lock securely.
[ MADE TO LAST ] – Reinforced ABS construction with anti-rust components and a riveted handle guarantee a durable product that is sure to stand the test of time.

[ LIFETIME WARRANTY ] - We are so confident in the quality of our pruning saw that a lifetime warranty is included in your purchase. If for any reason you are unsatisfied with your purchase, simply contact us and we will make it right.

name: Samurai KISI FC-240-LH / 9 1/2" (24cm) Folding Curved Blade Saw Made in Japan

Blade-Only B083TX2TGY
product_description: Samurai Folding Curved Hand Saw Made in Japan. KISI (FC Series) A well balanced, folding, hand saw for the gardener and the professional alike. The Samurai taper ground blades and the ergonomically designed handles offer exceptional comfort and superb cutting performance. The computer-designed, folding handle is based on human engineering principals. The hand grip is covered with rubber cushion to prevent slipping. The special curve of the handle reduces effort required for cutting, - making it possible to cut harder material with ease. The notched end of the handle prevents accidental dropping of the saw - when loosely held and the blade can be folded up - and housed inside the handle for safety and blade protection. The curved blade offers best results when cutting above shoulder height. Specs: Model: FC-240-LH Blade Type: Curved. Blade Length: 240mm (9 1/2") Tooth Pitch: 4mm. Contact us for any question regarding this item.

name: Gerber Freescape Camp Saw Folding Hand Saw for Backpacking Hiking Camping Pruning and Bushcraft, 12" Blade
short_description: IN THE BOX: Freescape Camp Saw with a 12" blade the folds completely flat for transportation

INNOVATIVE DESIGN: Our compact design allows the saw to fold up flat while remaining completely assembled and without threat of lost parts. It uses 4 pivot points to effectively cut larger diameter wood while using the full legth of the blade. When folded up the blade is protected and can be stowed safely in a gear kit or camp bin

BRIGHT ACCENTS: Its bright green accents along the black rubber surface make it easy to spot in the shuffle of camp gear. The grippy rubber Freescape textured handle stays firmly in the hand no matter the conditions. Replace the saw’s standard 12” blade easily if required.d]
CONVENIENT SIZE: The 12" Blade is big enough for function on the site and it folds completely flat to fit into your backpack.

name: Felco Folding Saw (F 600) - Classic Tree Pruning Saw with Pull-Stroke Action, Red
short_description: QUALITY COMPONENTS - The small saw's high-quality steel, rust-resistant chromed blades deliver effortlessly clean, precise cuts. The impulse heated blade teeth resist corrosion for maintenance-free long term satisfaction.

MINIMIZES BUILDUP - The Felco 600 folding pull stroke pruning saw's conical blade and expertly designed teeth geometry eliminates clogging and sap build-up for efficient high-performance cutting of large diameters.

HIGH PERFORMANCE - Felco's exceptionally durable pull-stroke pruning saws provide unmatched performance for a variety of arboriculture, landscaping, and horticultural tasks. The camping saw cuts branches up to 4-inches in diameter
SIMPLE TO USE - The saw pruner has an ergonomic non-slip handle that increases comfort and safety while working. The F-600 conveniently folds in half and can be easily carried in a pocket.

INNOVATIVE DESIGN - The trimming hand saw has a uniquely shaped blade that is thinner on the top and thicker on the bottom to prevent clogging and binding. The saw is 14-inches in overall length with a 6-inch blade, and it weighs 5.5-ounces.
product_description: Felco Folding Saw (F 600) - Classic Tree Pruning Saw with Pull-Stroke Action, Red

name: Folding Pruning Hand Saw 5 Inch Camping Wood Mini Small Saw Garden Tree Saws Japanese Pull Razor Teeth Saws Durable for Wood Branches Bone Camping with SK-5 Steel Blade.
short_description: Bright and long service life Sharp durable saw blade:Blade choose5.1" SK-5 steel blade, made in Korea and 1.2mm thick, after high frequency hardening,the hardness of the blade body reaches 51-52 hrc and the tooth tip reaches 64-67 hrc,designed to two staggered rows of triple-cut razor teeth ( 7 TPI ),and use grinding process and chrome-plated surface treatment.
Elevated branches can be cut diagonally:Two gear adjustment:It has two latching positions to lock. One is 180 degrees and the other one around (180 + 30) degrees making it super easier for holding.
Easy and fast blade replacement:The black screw of the saw is just sized to hold a coin, allowing a coin to replace a screwdriver to replace the blade.
Time-saving and labor-saving handle:TPE non-slip Handle,Ergonomic and durable rugged handle feels comfortable.
afe and portable for easy storage:The blades of our folding camping saw fit perfectly with the handle, so no teeth are exposed when closed,and the box has hooks for easy storage.

name: LAGOM Folding Camp Saw for Cutting Branches, 11.4" Curved Blade | SK5 Steel, Ergonomic Handle, One-Hand Use, Secure Lock | Foldable Pruning Tool for Camping, Gardening, Survival, Kayaking, Outdoors
short_description: [A Blade That Holds Its Edge—and Your Trust] Made from high-carbon SK5 steel, this blade is designed for real work—cutting through dense wood, thick tree limbs, and overgrown brush with ease. It’s not just a tool—it’s the kind of quiet duty you carry with you into the wild.

[The Right Tool in a World That Moves Too Fast] This folding hand saw doesn’t rush. It asks for presence. Whether you’re trimming a stubborn branch in the garden, or out on a quiet camp morning gathering wood, it’s a reminder that slowness can still be strong.

[Safety, by Design] Its 3-gear lock design holds the saw firmly in place—open when you're working, closed when you’re not. Because when you're out in the elements, your tools shouldn’t second-guess you.

[Small Enough to Hold. Strong Enough to Rely On.] A mini cutter with a purpose. Lightweight, foldable, and ready when the work finds you—whether you’re held up in a tree, elbows deep in your gardening bed, or miles from anything on a bushcraft trail.

[For Every Branch You Choose to Clear] This isn’t just for the backcountry. It belongs in the garden, in your camping pack, in the glove box. Wherever pruning, trimming, or thoughtful clearing needs to happen, this portable hand saw shows up.

[Loved by Everyday Hands and Quiet Makers] This pruner has found its way into the hands of influencers, craftspeople, and quiet doers alike—not because it’s trendy, but because it works. Real saws don’t need to shout to be seen.
[Clean Cuts, Fewer Snags] Thanks to a non-stick coating and chip-clearing design, you’ll move through even dense wood with less effort and more flow. Every stroke is smoother—less drag, more done.

[Made to Fit a Human Hand, Not a Machine] We shaped the handle to feel like an extension of your hand—soft where it needs to be, solid where it counts. Whether you’re cutting, shaping, or pruning, comfort leads to presence.

[Gift-Worthy, Even If You Keep It for Yourself] This isn’t a throwaway. It’s packaged with intention, ready for gifting to a fellow wanderer, a weekend gardener, or someone just starting their survival kit. A folding saw with stories to come.

[When the Work Is Quiet, But the Intention Is Clear] There’s a rhythm to clearing a path—cutting back the overgrowth, shaping space around a tree, or making kindling before dusk settles over camp. This folding saw moves with you in those in-between hours, steady in your hand, compact enough to carry, and sharp enough to remind you that even the mini tools can do meaningful work.
